bootDeviceExternal: Set SW2 dip switch to position 1:on, 2:on. Also, make sure jumpers J20 and J33 are set towards the edge of the board.
Press and hold the power button PB1 - PB2 until you hear a double buzz sound.
flashIndicator: the device is shut down and press the power switch PWR SW to the off position
bootDevice: Remove the Artik520 module from the evaluation carrier and plug it on the {{name}} carrier.
Press and hold the power button PB1 - PB2 until you hear a double buzz sound.
